Name: Kool Hand Luke
Ingredients: 45 ml Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum
25 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Rocks glass .
MUDDLE lime in base of glass to release juices.
Two-thirds fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN with barspoon.
ADD more crushed ice to fill glass.
Review: Looks like a Caipirinha and has a similar balance of sweet, sour and spirit. The bitters bring out the spice in the rum, which is every bit as pungent as cachaça.
